properties.title: Préhisto-parc e grotte
properties.abstract:
The Préhisto-Parc offers a fascinating journey through time. 45 life-size simulations along the guided route allow you to track the main stages of the evolution of animals. 
The Réclère Caves were discovered in 1886, when their first visitors were immediately amazed.
properties.description:
Préhisto-Parc: a route of 2 km through a superb Jura forest features numerous signboards with information, so visitors can enlarge their knowledge as they admire the models, which are based on the latest findings from the world of paleontology. Above the pool that is home to the impressive marine reptiles, a suspended walkway also provides an opportunity for tightrope walking! A large observation tower, in the shape of a double ADN helix, affords a superb view over the valley of the river Doubs and its meanders.

Réclère Caves: visitors walk along a 1500-meter route to discover various stalagmites and stalactites of exceptional beauty, including the elegant Pagoda and the Dome which, at 15 meters high, is Switzerland's largest stalagmite.
properties.name: Jura Tourisme
